-- Create external table ExternalAggWeatherConditions
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggWeatherConditions (
    date DATE,
    weather_main_value VARCHAR(100),
count INT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = --location of your external agg weather co
    DATA_SOURCE = ?,
    FILE_FORMAT = ?
);
GO
